sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To observe the anti - infection and anti - pyretic effect in vivo of Minor Decoction of Bupleurum ( Xiaochaihu Tang ) .

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (as a medical term, now only in antipyretic): from modern Latin pyreticus, from Greek puretos 'fever'
